original_title: M男遊戯 罵倒スイートルーム 碧しのがSNSで見つけたM男疑惑の男を追跡捜査 碧しの
overview: "Aoi Shino" is a sadist active in Tokyo. She "looks for hidden M men" on the streets and on SNS, etc., and follows them. I feel blissful. A third-rate AV director who is interested in Aoi's activities infiltrates and interviews her, but...
title: Maso Man Hot Plays The Sexual Abuse Suite Room Shino Aoi Has Discovered A Maso Man Suspect On Social Media And Is Making An Investigative Pursuit
